# skinType

**Instance Property**

The user’s skin type.

## Declaration

```swift
var skinType: HKFitzpatrickSkinType { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of possible skin types, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFitzpatrickSkinType].

## Valid Skin Types

- **HKFitzpatrickSkinType**: Categories representing the user’s skin type based on the Fitzpatrick scale.
